Texts.Chs: 干得好，现在有了我们需要的一切材料，我们就可以来酿一瓶酒香四溢的瓦特酒了。
Texts.Eng: Nice. Now we have everything we need to make a delicious wartwine.

Texts.Chs: 准备^orange;葡萄^reset;和一个^orange;空桶^reset;，使用^orange;水果压榨机^reset;来制作^green;葡萄醪^reset;。你应该需要两份葡萄来酿酒。
Texts.Eng: Use some ^orange;Grapes^reset; and an ^orange;Empty Bucket^reset; in the ^orange;Wine Press^reset; to make ^orange;Grape Mash^reset;. You'll want two units of it for the wine you'll be making.
